name: Alien Attack (MrNy)
description:
It was the year of 2019. People was just planning their holiday when we got the answer to the question on everybodys mind - are there aliens up there? It turns out they are not only up there, but they did actually come 'down to earth'  some time ago and have built their own playground. Now it's up to you to face them in a fight for humanity in this one-level Epic Megajam contribution of 2019.

You play this game using the standard mouse + WASD keys to move around.

Use left mousebutton to fire standard shots and right to fire alternative if you pick up a powerup.

Use Space for jumping.

There are a total of 10 waves of enemies to handle - Good luck.
